attributes.action: Grass Roots Premier League player sponsored Junior Football Leagues
attributes.additional_details: If all Premier League football teams encouraged all of their senior players, to sponsor a local junior football club,  The association would encourage youngsters from the local community to turn up and try out for the teams which can only be beneficial for the grass roots football  of the Football Association.

rejection.details: Not anything the Government can do - something to lobby the Football Association about.
